name: Kyon & Koizumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: Koizumi: "The world is at peace."

name: Koizumi Talking About the Stars
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another 《SOS Brigade》 character in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: I was pretty moved when I caught a glimpse of the moons of Jupiter.

name: Kyon Looking Up at the Night Sky
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: The time that we've lost, eh…

name: 5th Grade Elementary Student, Kyon's Sister
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kyon, the phone's ringing.

name: Mikuru Wishing Upon the Stars
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is two or less, this card gets +1500 power.
【ACT】 [(2)] Choose one of your 《Time》 characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I hope to get better at sewing."

name: Time Travel, Kyon & Mikuru
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《SOS Brigade》 characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 [【REST】 this card] When another of your characters is put into your clock from the stage, if this card is 【STAND】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavor_text:
Mikuru(Adult): "You can give
the sleeping me there a kiss. But only while she's asleep."

name: Encounter with Mikuru, Mikuru(Adult)
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if a card named "Guiding Role" is in your climax area, return this card to your hand, choose one of your 《Time》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text:
So this is how I looked
back then…

name: Energetic Senior, Tsuruya
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Time》 or 《Forehead》 characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card's trigger icon is Treasure@, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You're so cute, Mikuru. I'd love to keep you as a pet!

name: Mikuru Working Part-time
flavor_text: Huh…

name: Flower Viewing, Mikuru
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Time》 or 《SOS Brigade》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Oh, they're so beautiful～

name: Cicada Capturing Competition, Mikuru
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Time》 or 《SOS Brigade》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Haruhi: "This will be the SOS Brigade's Cicada Capturing Competition!"

name: Guiding Role
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: Mikuru(Adult): "Guiding you from this point on is mine."

name: “Super Director” Haruhi
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 2 or higher characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《SOS Brigade》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Okay! Now let's try this for real!

name: Flower Viewing, Haruhi
flavor_text: Of course! Come on.

name: “Bamboo Leaf Rhapsody” Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《SOS Brigade》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "I am here" is in your climax area, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I don't know who you are, but if you're not doing anything, then help me out.

name: Girl Who Will Change the World, Haruhi
ability: 【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your 《SOS Brigade》 characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

We're going to do something
really exciting!

name: Swimsuit Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put this card into your clock] When a card named "End of Summer" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Flower Viewing, Haruhi" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
